sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Intel topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.1%.
Year to date, Intel registers a 3.2% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Boeing, trading down 1.5%.
Boeing is showing a gain of 19.3% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot, trading down 1.4%, and Caterpillar, trading up 2.1% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
